ygData.subject: Re: SG Guild Suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: well... at the end of the day if no one to take over... i suppose just sell it and the money goes back into the fund... thast my 2cp... Nic p/s : still wearing
ygData.messageBody:
well... at the end of the day if no one to take over... i suppose just sell
it and the money goes back into the fund...

thast my 2cp...
Nic
p/s : still wearing senior apprentice robe... hehe...
----- Original Message -----
From: Tommy Fong <tommyfong@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 8:23 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] SG Guild Suggestions


> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
>
> The problem is I can't find any taker to pass the Thug..... ;)
>
> On Thu, 19 Aug 1999 11:05:35 +0800, LKW wrote:
>
> >If any kakis found an artifact which he dun bother to sell or none of his
> >chars can use it, he can pass to another kakis who can use it. Say
Garren
> >found a Thug robe which he or his other chars can't use, and he dun
bother
> >to sell. In the end he gave to Ziltus. Later when Ziltus got a Goss
robe,
> >he is NOT supposed to sell the Thug robe for his own benefit. Instead,
he
> >pass it to FF. Now FF got a FBR, he will then pass the Thug robe to the
> >next kakis who can use it. This way we can practice kakis heritage
system
> >which will benefit more kakis.
>
>
> Good Hunting,
>
> FlyingFox Everest, Level 29 Magician
>
